channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description:
everytime i try to play i it never works always comes up with
" error connecting to server. Must be down. click "cancel" then "start Server" to make your own "
but ive already done this so i do it again and the same error message comes up so what do i need to do i use the internet loggin system please help

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

Well when you click “start server” that only works for a moparscape server. You have to download a source and extract the files. Then click “run server” or “voule”. Once you do that it should let you on, but no other players will be allowed onto the server until you portforward.

Requirements:

  1. your must have a no-ip account, and no-ip.duc installed.
  2. you must portforward.

Use portforward.com and it will teach you about it. To get you started when you get there you click your router type,
then you click “rune”. After that it will redirect you to the page with the information, follow the instructions and your
problem will be solves within the blink of an eye. If you did it correctly of course.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mac_dee660 wrote:

i click start server and the server ip that comes up is 127.0.0.1 i try that then the first time i try to log in with any username and pass it says no response from server try using a different world so i really dunno what to do
